duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare monthly and annual financial and KPI reports with commentary for presentation to managers
Provide financial data requested by operating departments for organization-wide meetings
Gather and synthesize information from each operating department for reporting at the Board of Directors meeting
Input data related to inventory management
Analyze general ledger activity for budget variances and report on discrepancies
Supervise accounts receivable and accounts payable ledgers for timeliness and accuracy
Serve as a liaison to external auditors
Research accounting matters for compliance with Generally Accepted Accounting Principles
Maintain the Finance department’s filing requirements schedule and file necessary reports/returns
Maintain all fixed asset files and related reporting requirements

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or Finance (Master's preferred)
